LanguageData.DMS_Hound_Base.label: Hound Charging Station
LanguageData.DMS_Hound_Base.description: A station for assembling and recharging Hounds.
LanguageData.DMS_Recharger.label: Automatroid Recharger
LanguageData.DMS_Recharger.description: Automatroids can recharge here. During the charging cycle, toxic wastepacks are produced and stored internally. Haulers must remove the wastepacks from time to time.
LanguageData.DMS_TrashBin_Base.label: Trashbin Charging Station
LanguageData.DMS_TrashBin_Base.description: A station for assembling and recharging trashbin units.
LanguageData.DMS_VerlingBird_Base.label: Verlingbird Charging Station
LanguageData.DMS_VerlingBird_Base.description: A station for assembling and recharging Verlingbirds.
